ExternalData.Titlesect: Agreement concerning the Suppression of the Manufacture of, Internal Trade in, and Use of, Prepared Opium
ExternalData.Conclusion: Geneva, 11 February 1925 and Lake Success, New York, 11 December 1946<superscript>1</superscript>

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 27 October 1947, the date on which the amendments to the Agreement, as set forth in the annex to the Protocol of 11 December 1946 entered into force, in accordance with paragraph 2 of article VII of the Protocol.
